title: Eco-Driven Annual General Meeting
sustainable_solution: 100% recycled stage decor materials, 95% of event waste composted, carbon offsets purchased.
summary: Our first major corporate event—400 attendees, zero-plastic policy, measurable sustainability outcomes.

title: Tech Product Launch
sustainable_solution: Planning phase: Solar-powered venue, digital-first collateral, hybrid streaming to reduce travel emissions.

title: Sustainable Family Wedding
sustainable_solution: Zero-waste catering, locally-sourced flowers, reusable decor, donation program for leftover food.

title: CSR Community Engagement Event
sustainable_solution: Educational workshops, tree-planting activities, waste segregation demos.

title: Corporate Sustainability Retreat
sustainable_solution: Off-grid venue, carbon-neutral transport, local sourcing, impact measurement.
